title: Body Sensors Kids Silk Gloves
features: ULTRA SOFT & WARM FABRIC: Made with 100% pure and high-quality silk, these glove liners are extremely breathable, lightweight and dependable, even in the harshest environment.
INCREDIBLY BREATHABLE: These glove liners are built for a flexible yet comfortable fit. Designed to be ultra-lightweight and soft, they will feel as if you are wearing nothing on your hands.

MOISTURE WICKING: Featuring built-in quick-dry technology, these glove liners will remain dry all day. They are most effective when paired with work gloves, winter gloves or mittens to create ultimate warmth.

CUSTOM COOLING & HEATING TECHNOLOGY: A custom fabric technology formulated to adapt to your body's changing physiology, allowing the liners to warm up or cool down, resulting in a perfectly balanced temperature!
HOW TO WASH: For best care, wash by hand and air dry. Silk fabrications are delicate, so it is recommended to keep this gear away from sharp points and Velcro as it can snag or pull threads.
description: Founded in 2019, Body Sensors was created to meet the needs of the everyday adventurer. Our purpose is to provide exceptional base layer equipment to outdoor enthusiasts at an affordable price. We specialize in silk base layers that are long-lasting, lightweight, ultra-soft, and extreme warmth and temperature control. Our clothing is perfect for every occasion: work, sports, traveling and leisure. Whether you're going on a hike or skiing with friends, be sure you're prepared with Body Sensors.
